1341910.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #7
1341910.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #7


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out
Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Five adventures included!
Alchemy in the Quartzite Dome An alchemical ritual for four to six characters of 5th - 6th level by Thio Graf
Survive: The Catacombs of Keep Doom An adventure for four to six characters of 6th - 8th level by Jonathan G. Nelson
Of Smoke & Dreams An adventure for three to four characters of 8th-10th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Raison D'etre 11 An adventure for four characters of 9th level, prepared to advance to 10th by Jonathan G. Nelson
Toussaint's Terrible Toll 15 An adventure for four to six characters of 19th - 20th level by Stephen Yeardley
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Aaron Gentry
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
